column3: aber a ɔhen no tsenaa ne fie mu
column4: na EWURADZE maa no ahomgye wɔ n’atamfo a woetwa no ho ehyia no nyinara nsamu no
column8: emi metse nkyindur ndua ofie mu
column9: na Nyankopɔn n’adakaa no si ntamadan ho atam mu."

column3: Kɔ
column4: kɛyɛ dza ɔwɔ w’akoma mu nyinara; na EWURADZE dzi w’ekyir."

column3: EWURADZE n’asɛm baa Natan hɔ dɛ
column5: "Kɔ na kɛka kyerɛ m’akowaa David dɛ
column7: Ana ɔwo na ibesi ofie ama me ma maatsena mu a?"

column2: "Osiandɛ ofitsi da a miyii Israelmba mifii Egypt bae ara dze bodu ndɛ da yi
column3: menntsenaa ofie mu da
column4: mbom asese na ntamadan ara na manantsew wɔ mu."

column2: "Mbeambea nyinara a menye Israelmba no nyinara anantsew no no mu no
column3: ana menye Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw mu biara a mehyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnnyɛn me man Israel no kaa asɛm bi dɛ
column4: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom nnsii nkyindur ndua ofie mmaa me?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei mbrɛ ka kyerɛ m’akowaa David nye dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi
column4: Emi na miyii wo mifii nguamban mu fii nguan ekyir dzi
column5: ma abɛyɛ ɔpanyin wɔ me man Israel do:"

column2: "na midzii w’ekyir wɔ beebiara mbrɛ ekɔree na metwitwa w’atamfo nyinara efi w’enyim; na mebɛma enya dzin kɛse
column3: dɛ asaase do akɛsefo hɔn dzin."

column2: "Na mibesiesie beebi ama me man Israel
column3: na matsɛw hɔn
column4: ma wɔaatsena hɔnankasa hɔn tsenabew
column5: na woeenntutu hɔn bio; nkyii so emumuyɛ mba no annhaw hɔn bio
column8: "nye ber a mehyɛɛ atsɛmbuafo dɛ wɔnhwɛ me man Israel do no; na mama ahom efi w’atamfo nyinara ho. Nkyii so EWURADZE ka kyerɛ wo dɛ EWURADZE na ɔbɛkyekyer ofie ama wo."

column3: na enye w’egyanom kɛda a
column4: medze w’asenyi a obedzi w’ekyir no a obefi wo nson mu no

column2: "Ɔno na obesi ofie ama me dzin
column3: na mebɛma n’ahendzi ahengua no etsim hɔ daa."
na ɔno ɔayɛ me ba: sɛ ɔyɛ bɔn a
column4: medze nyimpa poma
column5: na ɔnye nyimpa mba mbaa mebɛtsea no;"

column3: dɛ mbrɛ miyii no wɔ Saul a mutuu no wɔ w’enyim no ho no."

column2: "Na wo fie na w’ahendzi besi pi daa wɔ w’enyim: w’ahengua betsim hɔ daa."

column3: na enyido adzehu yi nyinara tse no
column4: dɛmara so na Natan kaa kyerɛɛ David."

column3: na ɔkɛtsenaa EWURADZE enyim; na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Emi nye woana
column7: na edze me aba ebodu ha yi?"

column3: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn
column4: iyi yɛ w’enyi do adze ketseaba: na ɔwo aka w’akowaa ne fie so ho asɛm dze ama mber tsentsen bi a ɔreba. Ana iyi so wɔyɛ ma adasa

column2: "Na David nka dɛn bio nkyerɛ wo? Osiandɛ ɔwoara inyim w’akowaa
column3: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn."
na dɛ mbrɛ wankasa w’akoma tse no
column4: nna ayɛ adze kɛse yi nyinara

column3: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn: osiandɛ obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔtse dɛ ɔwo
column4: nkyii so Nyankopɔn biara nnyi hɔ ka wo ho
column5: dɛ mbrɛ dza yɛdze hɛn aso atse no nyinara tse no."

column2: "Na ɔman bɛn na ɔwɔ asaase do a ɔtse dɛ wo man
column3: ɔtse dɛ Israel a Nyankopɔn sii mu kɔree kɔpoon hɔn dze gyee ɔman maa noho
column4: na ɔdze gyee dzin
column5: na ɔdze yɛɛ ndzɛmba akɛse maa hom
column6: na ndzɛmba a ɔyɛ hu maa w’asaase
column7: wɔ wo man a epoon hɔn fii Egypt maa woho
column8: wɔ amanaman na hɔn enyame nsamu no enyim?"

column2: "Na ɔwoara dze wo man Israel tsiim hɔ maa woho dɛ ɔnyɛ ɔman mma wo daa; na ɔwo
column3: EWURADZE
column4: bɛyɛɛ hɔn Nyankopɔn."

column3: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn
column4: asɛm a aka wɔ w’akowaa ho na ne fie ho no
column6: na yɛ dɛ mbrɛ aka no."

column3: dɛ
column4: Dɔm EWURADZE nye Israel do Nyankopɔn: na w’akowaa David fie ntsim wɔ w’enyim."

column3: dɔm EWURADZE
column4: Israel Nyankopɔn
column5: na ada no edzi akyerɛ w’akowaa
column6: dɛ mebɛkyekyer ofie ama wo: dɛm ntsi na w’akowaa ehu no wɔ n’akoma mu dɛ ɔbɔ mpaa yi ma wo yi."

column3: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn
column4: Ɔwoara nye Nyankopɔn
column6: na ɔwoara na edze adze pa yi abɔ w’akowaa anohoba:"

column2: "dɛm ntsi afei ma ɔnyɛ wo fɛw dɛ ibehyira w’akowaa ne fie
column3: ama ɔaako hɔ wɔ w’enyim daa: na ɔwo
column4: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn
column5: na aka: na wo nhyira na ma wɔmfa nhyira w’akowaa ne fie daa."
